data.title: Name of College or University in "Name of school/institution" field?
data.meta_description: I have completed my Bachelor & Master from ABC college which is affiliated with XYZ university. At the end of study degree is awarded by XYZ university. In...
data.text:
I have completed my Bachelor & Master from ABC college which is affiliated with XYZ university. At the end of study degree is awarded by XYZ university. In the degree certificate, it is mentioned that candidate has studied in ABC college which is affiliated with university. My question is what should I mention (college name or university name) in "Name of school/institution" field while creating my express entry profile? However ECA by WES only mention university name.

I have completed my Bachelor & Master from ABC college which is affiliated with XYZ university. At the end of study degree is awarded by XYZ university. In the degree certificate, it is mentioned that candidate has studied in ABC college which is affiliated with university. My question is what should I mention (college name or university name) in "Name of school/institution" field while creating my express entry profile? However ECA by WES only mention university name.

Is there a separate option for University?

No. Here is screenshots. https://imgur.com/cyfet6D

I just now checked in my express entry profile, it is the College Name and not the university name. All the best!

I used the name of the university that awarded the degree to keep the ECA and the EE profile the same in terms of information provided.

Did writing the name of the university work for you?

Dear I have same issue. I studied from XYZ university affiliated institute ABC. The degree is of XYZ but has institute ABC mentioned on it. I am yet to go for ECA. On WES list of universities, XYZ is mentioned but not the affiliated institute ABC. Is it okay? Should I go with WES?

Dear I have same issue. I studied from XYZ university affiliated institute ABC. The degree is of XYZ but has institute ABC mentioned on it. I am yet to go for ECA. On WES list of universities, XYZ is mentioned but not the affiliated institute ABC. Is it okay? Should I go with WES?

You will need only university name for wes and same university will give u transcripts for further

What if the awarding institute is in another city. Then in the address for that period of time, should I write the awarding institute city's address or the college in which I studied, the address of that should be added? I was not a resident of the awarding body's city for one day, so how should I convince through my application? The name of the city is also a part of the name of the awarding body's name. Really confused on this matter..... !!!!

What if the awarding institute is in another city. Then in the address for that period of time, should I write the awarding institute city's address or the college in which I studied, the address of that should be added? I was not a resident of the awarding body's city for one day, so how should I convince through my application? The name of the city is also a part of the name of the awarding body's name. Really confused on this matter..... !!!!

Hi ! What did you chose finally? I am also confused same way

Hi ! What did you chose finally? I am also confused same way

Well for ECA I entered the name of the city in which the degree was awarded. That is the name of the city of the board. I am still at the ECA stage of the application, so I haven't further proceeded. However, on ECA, the education institute and the board's name both are mentioned by ICES.

Hi All,

I have noticed that the University Name mentioned on WES report is different than University name on Degree Certificate . Which University name should I mention in 'Name of school/institution" field' from WES or Degree Certificate . Also what is the city ( as my University and College Locations were different.

Please advise
